text: @SpeakerPelosi I fear #Trump will lead to the death of us all. Trump continues to talk about making ppl go back to work after Easter. We Are no where ahead of this virus. The US is now like a Third World country in regards to #Coronavirus Someone must stop him. Can you and our party do nothing?
